column5: This is a really great documentary.  Fisherman and any Canadian will find this entertaining and provoking.  Leaves me speechless and angry.  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UM-pkQTGDEU  It's long but interesting the whole way through. Good for a day like this.  It helped me connect the dots about what has been going on in BC the last few years, Harpers governance style, big industry, and what the public can do.  Norwegians can take their farmed Atlantic salmon and ...
Yup, seen it about a month ago, definitely worth watching. Sign the petition!

Thank you for posting this... and please no disrespect intended, but this has been posted here before. Many times. I am glad though that this documentary has opened your eyes  Now that you have been "awakened" what do you think you can do to help? Sometimes something as simple as an email or letter of your displeasure is enough... sometimes more radical action.  That same I am glad you found this video and found it worthy to share with us... as other before you have as well.. Passion is a good thing!   G
